input.Description: Serial position of a presented item (n/a for repeats and intrusions)

output.Description: Position of a recalled item during recall (n/a if item presented but not recalled)

study.Description: Indicator of whether an item was studied

Levels.true: Item was studied in the current list
Levels.false: Item was not studied in the current list (or item is a repeat of a previous recall)

recall.Description: Indicator of whether an item was recalled

Levels.true: Item was recalled after list presentation (may be a repeat or intrusion)
Levels.false: Item was not recalled after list presentation

repeat.Description: Number of times this item has been repeated during recall at this output posiiton

intrusion.Description: Indicator of whether an item was an intrusion not from the current list

Levels.true: Item was not presented in the current list, but was recalled

task.Description: Task condition of the current list

category.Description: Category of this item (n/a for intrusions)

period.Description: Number of the recaall period of this item's category (or recall period in which an intrusion was made)

category_input.Description: Serial position of a presented item, relative to other items in the same category (n/a for repeats and intrusions)
